statements: SELECT customer_id, behavior_type, timestamp, message_sent FROM customer_behavior_data WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT * FROM customer_behavior_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT customer_id, behavior_type FROM customer_behavior_data WHERE message_sent = TRUE
SELECT customer_id, behavior_type, message_sent FROM customer_behavior_data WHERE behavior_type LIKE '%purchase%'
SELECT timestamp, message_sent, behavior_type, customer_id FROM customer_behavior_data
SELECT * FROM customer_behavior_data WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_id, behavior_type FROM customer_behavior_data WHERE message_sent = TRUE ORDER BY customer_id ASC, timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT behavior_type FROM customer_behavior_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-03-31 23:59:59';
SELECT customer_id, behavior_type, timestamp FROM customer_behavior_data WHERE behavior_type LIKE '%purchase%' AND message_sent = TRUE ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT customer_id) AS unique_customers, COUNT(*) AS total_events FROM customer_behavior_data WHERE message_sent = TRUE AND timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT message_id, customer_id, message_content, send_date FROM messages
SELECT * FROM messages WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT customer_id, message_content FROM messages ORDER BY send_date DESC
SELECT behavior_type, behavior_date FROM customer_behavior WHERE customer_id = 2
SELECT MAX(message_id) AS max_message_id FROM messages
SELECT message_content FROM messages WHERE message_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM messages WHERE send_date > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT message_content, send_date FROM messages ORDER BY send_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_behavior WHERE behavior_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-02-01 00:00:00';
SELECT behavior_type, COUNT(*) AS total_behavior_count FROM customer_behavior GROUP BY behavior_type ORDER BY total_behavior_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT message_id, message_text FROM automated_messages ORDER BY sent_timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT event_type, event_timestamp FROM behavior_data WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT * FROM behavior_data WHERE event_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY event_timestamp ASC;
SELECT automated_messages.message_text, customers.customer_name FROM automated_messages JOIN customers ON automated_messages.customer_id = customers.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM customer_behavior WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY behavior_timestamp ASC;
SELECT message_content FROM messages WHERE customer_id = 4 ORDER BY sent_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM message_logs WHERE status = 'SUCCESS' ORDER BY log_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_messages FROM messages GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT c.customer_name, m.message_content FROM customers c JOIN messages m ON c.customer_id = m.customer_id WHERE m.sent_timestamp > '2021-01-01';
SELECT c.customer_name, COUNT(ml.log_id) AS total_logs FROM customers c LEFT JOIN message_logs ml ON c.customer_id = ml.message_id GROUP BY c.customer_id ORDER BY total_logs DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_data;
SELECT name, email FROM customer_data WHERE behavior_type = 'purchase';
SELECT customer_id, last_interaction FROM customer_data ORDER BY last_interaction DESC;
SELECT template_name, message_content FROM message_templates WHERE CHAR_LENGTH(message_content) > 50;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_messages FROM sent_messages GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM customer_data;
SELECT name, email FROM customer_data WHERE behavior_type='purchase' ORDER BY last_interaction DESC;
SELECT customer_id, behavior_type, last_interaction FROM customer_data WHERE behavior_type='interaction' AND name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT DISTINCT template_name FROM message_templates WHERE created_at > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY template_id;
SELECT message_id, log_timestamp, log_details FROM message_logs ml JOIN sent_messages sm ON ml.message_id = sm.message_id WHERE sm.customer_id = 100 ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
